providerId.title: Id of bridging provider
providerId.description: The id links order with a bridging provider which processes it

destinationChainId.title: Bridging destination chainId
destinationChainId.description: Id of a blockchain where funds will be received

destinationTokenAddress.title: Bridging destination token address
destinationTokenAddress.description: Address of a token that will be received at destination chain. The chain might be EVM or non-EVM. Some chains might even not have a token address. E.g.: Bitcoin

quoteId.title: Bridge provider quote id
quoteId.description: An ID of a quote which is used for bridging

quoteSignature.title: Bridge provider quote signature
quoteSignature.description: Provider who implement ReceiverAccountBridgeProvider must return a signature of a quote than will be used to verify the quote deposit address validity
